abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32965726, pmid32894782, pmid32955080, pmid32951147, pmid32950986, pmid32951032, pmid32960247, pmid32951244, pmid32970921, pmid32970782, pmid32951007
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.28
